issueTitle: Pop-up window does not disappear until the date is not changed grandfather
author: Dzmitry Shkel
stepsToReproduce: Select a date next to the last delivery date in the menu (e.x. menu 8-11 Nov, select 15 Nov)
After the pop-up 'Delivery up to 14.11' appears, click on the 'Change a date' button
expectedResult: The pop-up 'Delivery up to 14.11' does not appear
actualResult: The Pop-up remains until the date is not changed to the suitable one
